subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kason Gabbard allowed two hits in seven innings and Coco Crisp drove in five runs yesterday as the Boston Red Sox routed the visiting Chicago White Sox for the second straight day, 11-2.
snippet: Kason Gabbard allowed two hits in seven innings and Coco Crisp drove in five runs yesterday as the Boston Red Sox routed the visiting Chicago White Sox for the second straight day, 11-2.
